meanings.definition: The act of speaking or expressing something verbally.
meanings.sent1: Her utterance of the poem was filled with emotion.
meanings.sent2: The teacher's utterance of the instructions was clear and easy to follow.
meanings.sent3: His utterance of the joke made everyone in the room laugh.
meanings.sent4: The utterance of the national anthem brought tears to everyone's eyes.
meanings.sent5: The utterance of the secret code unlocked the hidden door.

meanings.sent1: The child's utterance of 'mommy' was her first word.
meanings.sent2: His utterance of 'thank you' was polite and appreciated.
meanings.sent3: The parrot's utterance of random words amused the guests.
meanings.sent4: The utterance of 'I love you' can brighten someone's day.
meanings.sent5: The utterance of the magic word opened the treasure chest.

meanings.sent1: The bird's utterance of chirping filled the morning air.
meanings.sent2: The utterance of the wind through the trees was calming.
meanings.sent3: The cat's utterance of meowing woke up the household.
meanings.sent4: The utterance of thunder in the distance signaled an approaching storm.
meanings.sent5: The utterance of the alarm clock ended his peaceful sleep.
